value.title: San Francisco Bay area leaders call on 6 million residents to stay home to avoid coronavirus spread
value.excerpt: SANTA BARBARA, Calif. — The leaders of six San Francisco Bay area counties, among the hardest hit by the widening coronavirus outbreak, called on more than 6 million California residents Monday to stay at home for weeks unless faced with an emergency.
